case: Your personal data is not sold

case: The service is transparent regarding government requests or inquiries that may involve your data.
quoteText: Furthermore, the Owner may be obliged to retain Personal Data for a longer period whenever required to do so for the performance of a legal obligation or upon order of an authority.

case: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.
quoteText: This Website does not support “Do Not Track” requests.
